Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde were the first team to qualify for the Round of 16 in the 2023 AFCON and are undefeated in the tournament.
Mauritania narrowly scraped into the Round of 16 with a win over Algeria in their final group game.
Beb√©, the former Manchester United winger, is expected to be a key player for Cape Verde, with a notable long-range goal in a previous match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be broadcast in India on FanCode, in the UK on Sky Sports, and in the US on beIN Sports.
Cape Verde and Mauritania have a head-to-head record of 11 matches, with Cape Verde winning 5, Mauritania winning 3, and draws making up the rest.
